import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{networkAdapter}from'services/NetworkAdapter';import HotelDetailsViewCard from'./components/hotel-details-view-card/HotelDetailsViewCard';import HotelDetailsViewCardSkeleton from'./components/hotel-details-view-card-skeleton/HotelDetailsViewCardSkeleton';/**
 * Represents the hotel details component.
 * @component
 * @returns {JSX.Element} The hotel details component.
 */import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HotelDetails=()=>{const{hotelId}=useParams();const[hotelDetails,setHotelDetails]=useState({isLoading:true,data:{}});useEffect(()=>{const fetchHotelDetails=async()=>{const response=await networkAdapter.get("/api/hotel/".concat(hotelId));setHotelDetails({isLoading:false,data:response.data});};fetchHotelDetails();},[hotelId]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:hotelDetails.isLoading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HotelDetailsViewCardSkeleton,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HotelDetailsViewCard,{hotelDetails:hotelDetails.data})});};export default HotelDetails;
